alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 5:44AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cattaraugus, southwestern Erie and east central Chautauqua Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 543 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gowanda, or 18 miles south of Hamburg, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Olean, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Springville, Gowanda, Ashford, Allegany, St. Bonaventure, Ashford Hollow, Weston Mills, Concord, Collins, Great Valley, New Albion, Dayton, Conewango, Leon, Carrollton, Randolph and Napoli. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 14 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
